content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 6, "index": 10}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "green_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 42, "index": 24}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 38, "index": 28}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 42, "index": 32}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 17, "index": 37}, {"type": "pink_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: I need to craft jungle_stairs, which requires placing 3 jungle_planks in the first row of the crafting table. I will move the first jungle_planks from slot 10 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 10}, {"type": "music_disc_mellohi", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "green_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 42, "index": 24}, {"type": "netherite_ingot", "quantity": 38, "index": 28}, {"type": "brick_slab", "quantity": 42, "index": 32}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 17, "index": 37}, {"type": "pink_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I need to move another jungle_planks to the right of the first one, so I will move it from slot 10 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 4 with quantity 1
